column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Perfect breezy morning today spent outside at Wildnerry Cafe. Awesome coffee
column2: delicious Belgian waffle (very light rather than a brick) and sausages
column4: though I do feel better about myself when I can't clean my plate :). Hubby had a build your own omelette that he said was "fluffy and loaded." Done in a pan-bake style
column5: not flipped--delicious. He did finish his
column6: but we're good til dinner now.
